org.dblp.mmdb

Class Mmdb

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.Mmdb
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MmdbInterface

    public class Mmdb
extends java.lang.Object
implements MmdbInterface
    This class builds a simple main memory data structure for the dblp records. A Mmdb object may contain the complete dblp collection or a subset of it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MmdbInterface EMTPY_MMDB
      An empty MMDB.

      Constructs the main memory database for the a subset of the dblp records.

    • Field Detail

      • EMTPY_MMDB

        public static final MmdbInterface EMTPY_MMDB
        An empty MMDB. Used mainly for testing code without building an actual Mmdb.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mmdb

        public Mmdb(java.io.InputStream inputstream,
            boolean verbose)
     throws java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the a subset of the dblp records.
        Parameters:
        inputstream - The dblp records to be loaded into the main memory database.
        verbose - If true, progress dots and timing information is printed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any SAX errors occur during processing

      • Mmdb

     throws java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the a subset of the dblp records.
        Parameters:
        inputstream - The dblp records to be loaded into the main memory database.
        verbose - If true, progress dots and timing information is printed.
        dtdInputStream - a n input stream which provides the content of the dblp.dtd
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur.

      • Mmdb

        public Mmdb(java.lang.String inputfilename,
            boolean verbose)
     throws java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the collection of dblp records. The verbose option may be switched on/off.
        Parameters:
        inputfilename - The name of the (large) dblp.xml file. The dblp.dtd file must be stored in the same directory.
        verbose - If true, progress dots and timing information is printed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any SAX errors occur during processing

      • Mmdb

        public Mmdb(java.lang.String inputfilename,
            boolean verbose,
            java.io.InputStream dtdInputStream)
     throws java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the collection of dblp records. The verbose option may be switched on/off.
        Parameters:
        inputfilename - The name of the (large) dblp.xml file. The dblp.dtd file must be stored in the same directory.
        verbose - If true, progress dots and timing information is printed.
        dtdInputStream - a n input stream which provides the content of the dblp.dtd
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if any SAX errors occur during processing

      • Mmdb

        public Mmdb(java.lang.String inputfilename)
     throws java.io.IOException,
            org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructs the main memory database for the collection of dblp records. (this version is non-verbose)
        Parameters:
        inputfilename - The name of the (large) dblp.xml file. The dblp.dtd file must be stored in the same directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if any IO errors occur.
